JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Would you like to be responsible for overseeing and improving the performance of our Global Key Account? We are looking for an experienced consultant to undertake the KPI management, commercial and contract negotiations, performance analysis and presentations to our Banking Customer and internal stakeholders.

Optimization and commercial operation/development ISS is looking for an analytical and driven professional to manage and facilitate commercial negotiations with our global customer on commercial business cases and contractual changes whilst ensuring this is aligned with operations, performance, and strategy. To succeed in the role building and maintaining good relationships is key to deliver on our value proposals. You will be instrumental in preparing efficient KPI management, business cases for cost optimizations and savings projects, as well as new sales presentations. You will operate in the space between Operations, Finance, Legal and Account Development.

We expect your key tasks and responsibilities will be centered around:
  • Manage and continuously monitor and optimize the ISS contract, ensuring contract promises are delivered optimally from a financial, legal, and commercial viewpoint
  • Lead and identify commercial opportunities, including optimizations, growth within existing services, and additional sales opportunities
  • Develop business cases based on data and contractual agreements
  • Manage and compile contract changes between ISS and The Customer, including ensuring processes are in place and governance and reporting is in line with internal and Customer Expectations
  • Identify and on-board new business opportunities in a commercial sound manner, including financial delivery and financial risk profiles contained within negotiated terms and conditions
  • Proactively monitor the KPIs for the contract, flag and have a dialogue with service responsible stakeholders how to ensure a high KPI performance
  • Collect KPI data, report and mitigate KPI performance to the customer
  • Manage and calculate the management fee at risk based on the KPI performance to report and sign-off with the customer
  • Lead, report and provide status updates on commercial optimization and savings program
  • Support in identifying and developing optimization business cases to be presented to the customer
To succeed in this job, you will have:
  • Excellent data analysis skills – you can analyze, identify trends within large amount of data and present it to clearly communicate commercial opportunities (e.g., either savings, optimizations, or sales opportunities)
  • A strong commercial mindset – you can identify commercial opportunities in the operations through data whilst ensure it is aligned with our contractual obligations.
  • High people skills – you are a great negotiator whilst balancing the interest of our customer, contractual obligations, and internal stakeholder interests. You can transform concepts into operations in collaboration with our operation managers.
Ideally, you have 2-5 years of experience from a similar role
  • Experience within managing and resolving complex commercial issues, especially linking commercial account management with operations, and aligning this to customer expectations (negotiation skills)
  • Solid Excel and data skills e.g., pivot tables, formulars to draw out trends etc. will be the foundation of all your responsibility and tasks
  • Proven track record on providing guidance and input on pricing models, contract management / changes, KPI management and development e.g., calculate KPI weighting related to financial fee at risk
  • Strong networker and communicator with ability to cultivate and maintain strong relationship with key stakeholders at customer and ISS
  • Assertive, negotiating mindset, self-motivated, structured and systematic, diplomatic, enthusiastic and convincing
  • Relevant commercial and/or legal education (Bachelor or Master of Science) or solid experience from key account management within facility services, operations, or corporate organisations
  • Master English Spoken/Written to expert level
  • Strong Danish language skills is beneficial, but not required
We look forward to welcoming you to the team You will join a team of 4 talented colleagues who all work within Account Development i.e. Governance and Account Development Planning, Risk & Compliance and corporate development. You will be reporting to the Account Development Manager.
We offer a competitive salary, pension, and Health Insurance. Furthermore, we focus on ensuring relevant training and development opportunities in the role.

Application We look forward to receiving your application. Please send your motivated application and CV at the latest on May 25. In case you have any questions about the role, please do not hesitate to contact Account Development Manager Amalie Heilmann at Amalie.Heilmann@dk.issworld.com or mobile: 2231 2567.
